author: phred
msg: 'no Apache::Reload' option to ignore reloading modules with that directive.
When Moose is being used, reloading a class will probably result in it being unusable.
Especially if the class uses roles or any of the method wrapping calls.
This adds "no Apache::Reload" to make sure that such modules are not attempted to be reloaded.

author: dkulp
msg: Remove some debug code I left in

author: dkulp
msg: Merge some fixes over that were discovered while testing with the parser built into java6.

author: trawick
msg: When running apps under suexec, mod_fcgid registers a child
cleanup with the pool of the process in order to switch ids
in the child prior to calling suexec.
As processes accumulated, this cleanup was run multiple times
in new child processes (unnecessary and unsuccessful).  Once
the fork() for the child has occurred, no-op the child cleanup
so that it won't affect subsequent child processes; they will
have their own pool with the child cleanup registered.

author: jbellis
msg: make AbstractBounds serializable for the benefit of JMX
